verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables, <S%G3850><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Has Become Like <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> To A Man <S%G444><s%> A King, <S%G935><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> A Wedding Feast <S%G1062><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> For His Son : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen <S%G846><s%> To Call <S%G2564><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Invited <S%G2564><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feast, <S%G1062><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Would Not <S%G2309><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Invited, <S%G2564><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G712><s%> My Dinner <S%G3450><s%> , I Prepared, <S%G2090><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5022><s%> My Oxen <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fatted Beasts <S%G4619><s%> Are Killed, <S%G2380><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All Things Are <S%G3956><s%> Ready; <S%G2092><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feast. <S%G1062><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Being Negligent Of It <S%G272><s%> Went Away, <S%G565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> , Field, <S%G68><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Another <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1711><s%> His Commerce. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Rest, <S%G3062><s%> Having Laid Hold Of <S%G2902><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen, <S%G846><s%> Insulted <S%G5195><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Killed Them. <S%G615><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard It <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Was Wroth, <S%G3710><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4753><s%> His Forces <S%G846><s%> He Destroyed <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5406><s%> Those Murderers, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> Their City <S%G846><s%> He Burnt. <S%G1714><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To His Bondmen, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Wedding Feast <S%G1062><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Had Been Invited <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not <S%G2258><s%> Worthy; <S%G514><s%>

Go <S%G4198><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Into <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thoroughfares <S%G1327><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Highways, <S%G3598><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3745><s%> As Many As <S%G302><s%> Ye Shall Find, <S%G2147><s%> Invite <S%G2564><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feast. <S%G1062><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> Those Bondmen <S%G1565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Highways <S%G3598><s%> Brought Together <S%G4863><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> They Found, <S%G2147><s%> Evil <S%G4190><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Good; <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became Full <S%G4130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feast <S%G1062><s%> Of Guests. <S%G345><s%>

<S%G1525><s%> And Coming In <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> To See <S%G2300><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Guests <S%G345><s%> Beheld <S%G1492><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Clothed <S%G1746><s%> With A Garment Of The <S%G1742><s%> Wedding Feast; <S%G1062><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Friend, <S%G2083><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Didst Thou Enter <S%G1525><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Garment <S%G1742><s%> Of The Wedding Feast? <S%G1062><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Was Speechless. <S%G5392><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Servants, <S%G1249><s%> Having Bound <S%G1210><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Take Away <S%G142><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast Out Him <S%G1544><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outer : <S%G1857><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weeping <S%G2805><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gnashing <S%G1030><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
<S%G4183><s%> For Many <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Called, <S%G2822><s%> <S%G3641><s%> But Few <S%G1161><s%> Chosen. <S%G1588><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Counsel <S%G4824><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> How <S%G3704><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Might Ensnare <S%G3802><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Discourse. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Send <S%G649><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Their Disciples <S%G846><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herodians, <S%G2265><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Teachest, <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Care <S%G3199><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> No One, <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Thou Lookest <S%G991><s%> On The <S%G1519><s%> Appearance <S%G4383><s%> Of Men; <S%G444><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Thou <S%G4671><s%> Thinkest? <S%G1380><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Tribute <S%G2778><s%> To Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Not? <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> But Knowing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4189><s%> Their Wickedness <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Tempt, <S%G3985><s%> Hypocrites? <S%G5273><s%>

Shew <S%G1925><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coin <S%G3546><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tribute. <S%G2778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Presented <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Denarius. <S%G1220><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Whose Is <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> This Image <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inscription? <S%G1923><s%>

They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Caesar's. <S%G2541><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Render <S%G591><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> To Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> They Wondered; <S%G2296><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leaving <S%G863><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Went Away. <S%G565><s%>

On <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Say <S%G3361><s%> There Is Not <S%G1511><s%> A Resurrection, <S%G386><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> , Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> Should Die <S%G599><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Shall Marry <S%G1918><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Raise Up <S%G450><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To His Brother. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> Now There Were <S%G1161><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Brothers; <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Having Married <S%G1060><s%> Died, <S%G5053><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To His Brother. <S%G846><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G3668><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second, <S%G1208><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third, <S%G5154><s%> Unto <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%>
<S%G5305><s%> And Last <S%G1161><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman. <S%G1135><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of Which <S%G5101><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Shall She Be <S%G2071><s%> Wife? <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3956><s%> For All <S%G1063><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Ye Err, <S%G4105><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> For In <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Do They Marry <S%G1060><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> , Are Given In Marriage, <S%G1547><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> They Are. <S%G1526><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Ye Not Read <S%G314><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSM God 2316 N-NSM Of Abraham 11 N-PRI And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM God 2316 N-NSM Of Isaac 2464 N-PRI And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM God 2316 N-NSM . Of Jacob? 2384 N-PRI Not 3756 PRT-N Is 2076 V-PXI-3S 3588 T-NSM God 2316 N-NSM God 2316 N-NSM Of The Dead, 3498 A-GPM But 235 CONJ Of The Living. 2198 V-PAP-GPM
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard, <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Were Astonished <S%G1605><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> His Teaching. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Had Silenced <S%G5392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> <S%G4863><s%> Were Gathered <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Together, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Questioned Him <S%G1905><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> A Doctor Of The Law, <S%G3544><s%> Tempting <S%G3985><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>
Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Which <S%G4169><s%> Commandment Is The <S%G1785><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ; Law? <S%G3551><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

<S%G1208><s%> And The Second Is <S%G1161><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> Thy Neighbour <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself. <S%G4572><s%>

On <S%G1722><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Hang. <S%G2910><s%>
<S%G4863><s%> But Having Been Assembled Together <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye <S%G5213><s%> Think <S%G1380><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%> Of Whom <S%G5101><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Is He? <S%G2076><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of David. <S%G1138><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Does Call? <S%G2564><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> To My Lord, <S%G3450><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1188><s%> My Right Hand <S%G3450><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> I Place <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Thine Enemies As <S%G4675><s%> A Footstool <S%G5286><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> For Thy Feet. <S%G4675><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Calls <S%G2564><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> Is He? <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Was Able <S%G1410><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Answer <S%G611><s%> A Word <S%G3056><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Dared <S%G5111><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> To Question <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Any More (lit. No More). <S%G3765><s%>
